item.title: [pi] Timer stuck?

@chazion wrote:

I’ve also added the void in the Initialize thing. My code is below

public void soTimerCounter() { if (soTimer > 0) { soTimer--; } else if (soTimer == 0) { soTimer = 250; } }

***I’ve added a command to check on the timer, it goes from 250 to 249 and stops.
